LanguageData.Make10Pemmican.label: make pemmican in bulk (10)
LanguageData.Make10Pemmican.description: Make pemmican, a preserved combination of meat and plant food. It doesn't taste amazing, but lasts a year without refrigeration.

LanguageData.Make20Pemmican.description: Make pemmican, a preserved combination of meat and plant food. It doesn't taste amazing, but lasts a year without refrigeration.
